content: bee-16 this pattern makes a small crochet bee it is made by crocheting in the round using medium worsted 4 yarn 3 75mm crochet hook stuffing the finished product is about 1 5 inches in diameter it is called the bee-16 because the widest rounds that make the body are 16 stitches only this pattern uses u s terminology 3 colors of yarn are used for each bee yellow black and white resources and terminology magic_ring https //www youtube com/watch v=bvqsm7vzrmo seamless color changing https //www youtube com/watch v=36rykxhq_ok single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase two single crochets in the same stitch decrease = decrease i like to use the invisible decrease for this pattern https //www youtube com/watch v=oubboz1ennk lastly to tie off an amigurumi crocheted in the round https //www youtube com/watch v=fjdf0lwqxwo body crocheting in the round yellow 1 8 single_crochet in magic_ring 8 2 increase * 8 16 3 16 single_crochet 16 change to black 4 16 single_crochet change to yellow 5 16 single_crochet this is the row that the wings will attach to change to black 6 16 single_crochet cut the black yarn a long tail and tie a knot with it on the inside with the other end take a yarn needle and decorate the face with the tail black yarn eyes tie it again on the inside with another strand of yarn alternatively you can use safety eyes here change to yellow 7 16 single_crochet 8 decrease * 8 9 stuff it well with polyfill tie off and hide the ends wings white 1 find the top two stitches directly in the middle of the body between the eyes and in between the two black bands insert hook attach white yarn sl then chain 3 2 slip_stitch back into the same space optional if attaching a keychain here is where we would insert the keychain then pull the yarn out of it to continue to crochet the other wing 3 insert hook into the 2nd wing space and sl then chain 3 4 slip_stitch back into the same space then tie the two ends of the yarn together and hide into the body i am unable to take pictures at the time of writing this pattern but i hope these drawings help~ will update with better pictures later
